author: entex
post_text: November 5, 2021 at 8:16â€¯AM#1Greetings!I generated a color fx to have a linear color fade and setting the speed to 0 to get a static look.Now i want to store the color values for each fixture as a preset to generate a color sweep from one color to the linear color fade generated by the cfx.Tried the store option "output", but this won't store any information in the preset.Would be thankful for a hint!Lukas
title: Store effect generated values as preset
